flaws.name: Cursed
flaws.description: Roll two more times and apply all results.

flaws.name: Gammy Foot
flaws.description: Suffers -1 to movement.

flaws.name: Brittle Bones
flaws.description: +1 damage received when hit.

flaws.name: Putrid Smell
flaws.description: All other models within 3" suffer -1 to Presence tests.

flaws.name: Weak Hands
flaws.description: Can only wield One-Handed Weapons. Cannot use a Shield or Torch while holding a Weapon.

flaws.name: Greasy Hands
flaws.description: -1 to all Agility tests.

flaws.name: One Eyed
flaws.description: -1 on all ranged attacks and all spells.

flaws.name: Malnutrition
flaws.description: -1 to all Strength tests.

flaws.name: Scared of Heights
flaws.description: Cannot climb or jump.

flaws.name: Angry
flaws.description: If a non-friendly model is within line of sight this model must move towards it and make an attack if possible. Uses its action and movement.

flaws.name: Weak Bodied
flaws.description: -1 HP.

flaws.name: Vacant Mind
flaws.description: Never collects Treasure or Items from the battlefield.

flaws.name: Allergic To Metal
flaws.description: Cannot wear metal Armor.

flaws.name: Squeamish
flaws.description: -1 damage dealt to others.

flaws.name: Slow Learner
flaws.description: +1 XP required to level up.

flaws.name: Scared of Monsters
flaws.description: -1 to attack Monsters and Beasts.

flaws.name: Loner
flaws.description: -1 on all tests when within 2" of a friendly model.

flaws.name: Realist
flaws.description: Cannot use Omens.

flaws.name: Poor Morale
flaws.description: Must make a Morale test whenever they take damage.

flaws.name: Newbie
flaws.description: Gain no Flaw and no Feat.

flaws.name: Luddite
flaws.description: Cannot use Weapons that Explode.

flaws.name: Scared of Dying
flaws.description: When any warband member dies, this model auto-fails a Morale test.

flaws.name: Steady On
flaws.description: Can only move once per activation.

flaws.name: One Foot in the Grave
flaws.description: If Downed, this model auto-fails Death Saves.

flaws.name: Dutch Courage
flaws.description: Must have Whisky equipped to participate in a Scenario.

feats.name: Intimidating Presence
feats.description: As an action, force an enemy model to make a Presence test. On failure you may move that model as if it were yours, or make it drop a weapon.

feats.name: Slippery When Wet
feats.description: Model automatically leaves combat.

feats.name: Cowardly
feats.description: Model suffers -1 on all Morale tests but gains +1 Agility.

feats.name: Meathead
feats.description: +2 Strength and -1 Presence.

feats.name: Mind Over Matter
feats.description: May make a Presence test to ignore D4 damage each time they are hit.

feats.name: Through Gritted Teeth
feats.description: May make a Presence test to avoid being Downed once per Scenario, remaining standing with 1 HP.

feats.name: Revolting Appearance
feats.description: Enemies suffer -1 to hit this model.

feats.name: What We Do in the Shadows
feats.description: Heal by drinking the blood of others. Make a melee attack and heal damage dealt. Gain Teeth [D4] [Agility] [Cruel]. Cannot be healed by any other means.

feats.name: Hard to See
feats.description: Cannot be targeted by enemy ranged attacks and cannot make ranged attacks. Spells work as normal.

feats.name: Tough as Nails
feats.description: +2 HP and -1 Agility.

feats.name: Marksman
feats.description: Increase range by 3" when using ranged weapons.

feats.name: Vaccinated
feats.description: Immune to Diseased.

feats.name: Rat Catcher
feats.description: Gains a free Bag o’ Rats.

feats.name: Alchemist
feats.description: Starts each Scenario with a Potion.

feats.name: Animal Lover
feats.description: Warband pays half cost to recruit Pets.

feats.name: Scavenger
feats.description: Makes two Treasure Rolls when searching and takes both results if slots are free. Excess Items are left on the ground.

feats.name: Barkskin
feats.description: +1 Armor from tough skin but -1 Agility.

feats.name: Clawed Nails
feats.description: Replace Fists with Claws [D6][Agility].

feats.name: Swindler
feats.description: At the end of a Scenario, if they survive Death Saves they gain one free Treasure Roll.

feats.name: Medic
feats.description: As an action, make a Presence test to heal one Downed model in line of sight. That model returns with 1 HP.

feats.name: Improvised Fighter
feats.description: As an action, can make a One-Handed Makeshift Weapon mid-Scenario.

feats.name: Shield Bash
feats.description: Deals +2 damage in melee when equipped with a Shield.

feats.name: Lucky Goblin Foot
feats.description: May reroll any one die roll per Scenario but has -1 Equipment slot.

feats.name: Charge
feats.description: May move twice its movement value but must end within 1" of an enemy; otherwise moves as normal.

feats.name: Feint/Disarm
feats.description: When attacked in melee may make an Agility test to Feint instead of striking back. On success avoids damage; if the attacker also fails to hit they are disarmed and drop their weapon.
